title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JavaScript libraries to pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc. locally with a built-in model registry and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, create models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; identical API surface to the JS client—chat, stream, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving LLM, embedder and retriever interfaces backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; folders, sharing, multimodal, RAG, admin panel, dark mode.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight React chat app that talks to local Ollama; no build step, runs in browser via CDN.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI with coloured chat REPL, conversation history, model search and bash completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into inline GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with docker-compose examples for persistent model cache.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that proxies to Ollama; supports file uploads and voice input.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Modelfiles (tools, personalities, code assistants) ready to pull.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained async Rust client crate covering chat, generate, embeddings and model ops.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# SDK with .NET 8, supporting streaming chat, embeddings and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama as an async chat endpoint with admin UI for model management.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into servers with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local models via @ollama mentions or DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to generate summaries, rewrite notes or answer questions using an Ollama model inside vault.
